Text:
Could you (or anyone) upload Powers from Icon/Marvel? Thanks for all your work. 

For everyone-My PC comes in next week and I'll be starting to upload my whole collection. Look for my stuff or make requests, I'll try to find it
@ stonedyoda:  new pc, huh?  xmas come early??  kewl!  i'll try to think of a request, or two.
StonedYoda, the last issue of Powers that shipped was Powers v3 #11 on August 29, 2012 and November 7, 2012 digitally.
